Title: Three Colors: White
Writer: Krzysztof Kieslowski (scenario), Krzysztof Piesiewicz (scenario), Agnieszka Holland (scenario collaborator), Edward Zebrowski (scenario collaborator), Edward Klosinski (scenario collaborator), Marcin Latallo (dialogue translation)
Actors: Zbigniew Zamachowski, Julie Delpy, Janusz Gajos, Jerzy Stuhr
Plot: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.
